mapper.sql: userID, name, password, roleID, sex, birthday, dutyID, workplace, createdate, createuser, updatedate, updateuser, deletedate, deleteuser, state, email, mobilephone, telephone, organID, industrialplant_id, industrialplant_name, productionline_id, productionline_name, productionprocess_id, productionprocess_name, worklocation_id, worklocation_name, cardno
mapper.select: select u.userID, u.name, u.password, u.roleID, u.sex, u.birthday, u.dutyID, u.workplace, u.createdate, u.createuser, u.updatedate, u.updateuser, u.deletedate, u.deleteuser, u.state, u.email, u.mobilephone, u.telephone, u.organID, u.industrialplant_id, u.industrialplant_name, u.productionline_id, u.productionline_name, u.productionprocess_id, u.productionprocess_name, u.worklocation_id, u.worklocation_name,(select r.role_name from tb_role r where r.role_id=u.roleID) as roleName ,u.cardno from tb_user u
